text.description:
Yes, I spent $15,000 on food in one day. But before you judge, wait until you see what three star dining looks like. In just a day, I ate breakfast at a one Michelin star restaurant, lunch at a two star, and dinner at a three star. Even getting a reservation at a Michelin star restaurant is difficult, let alone actually dining and stomaching the often steep price of the meal.
I want to give a massive thanks to the three restaurants and their amazing teams for allowing us to document the experience and even venture into their sacred kitchens. Those of you watching should consider yourselves lucky, too. Seeing behind-the-scenes in such high-end kitchens is something truly special.
Rezdôra - ONE MICHELIN STAR Website: https://www.rezdora.nyc
Gabriel Kreuther - TWO MICHELIN STAR Cookbook: https://amzn.to/3FX4obo
Per Se - THREE MICHELIN STAR Website: https://www.thomaskeller.com/perseny
SUBSCRIBE TO CATCH GORDON RAMSAY ╔═╦╗╔╦╗╔═╦═╦╦╦╦╗╔═╗ ║╚╣║║║╚╣╚╣╔╣╔╣║╚╣═╣ ╠╗║╚╝║║╠╗║╚╣║║║║║═╣ ╚═╩══╩═╩═╩═╩╝╚╩═╩═╝
------------------------------------------------------------------- follow all of these for a bite
• Snapchat - https://www.snapchat.com/add/nick.digiovanni • Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/nick.digiovanni/ • TikTok - https://www.tiktok.com/@nick.digiovanni • Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/nick.digiovanni • Text Me - https://laylo.com/nickdigiovanni -------------------------------------------------------------------

text.title: Eating A $3,000 Michelin Star Dinner

yet the vast majority of us will never

about restaurants this good the better
the restaurant the quieter the kitchen

when it comes time to actually cook
everything and i feel like that same

key difference between a michelin star
restaurant and any regular place you
might go dine at this evening is one
simple thing attention to detail that
was made clear across all of our dining
